blogPost.title: How can you avoid being a 'taker' in a conversation? Answer by @xsvengoechea, author of Listen Like You Mean it. https://t.co/lrQdiZGOkw https://t.co/Mq2B9obJET
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 会話の中で "Taker "にならないためには？Answer by @xsvengoechea, author of Listen Like You Mean it. https://t.co/lrQdiZGOkw https://t.co/Mq2B9obJET
如何避免在谈话中成为一个 "索取者"？回答者：@xsvengoechea，《认真倾听》作者。https://t.co/lrQdiZGOkw https://t.co/Mq2B9obJET
如何避免在談話中成爲一個 "索取者"？回答者：@xsvengoechea，《認真傾聽》作者。https://t.co/lrQdiZGOkw https://t.co/Mq2B9obJET

previous.title: What are some good tips for finding balance and mindfulness in life? Answer by @justinkan, Entrepreneur & investor. CEO of Atrium. https://t.co/OS7p5C2406 https://t.co/0YqrWzV4pD

localize.full_text: 人生のバランスとマインドフルネスを見つけるための良いヒントを教えてください。回答者：@justinkan, Entrepreneur & investor. AtriumのCEO。https://t.co/OS7p5C2406 https://t.co/0YqrWzV4pD
在生活中寻找平衡和心态有什么好的建议？回答者：@justinkan, 企业家& 投资者。Atrium的CEO。https://t.co/OS7p5C2406 https://t.co/0YqrWzV4pD
在生活中尋找平衡和心態有什麼好的建議？回答者：@justinkan, 企業家& 投資者。Atrium的CEO。https://t.co/OS7p5C2406 https://t.co/0YqrWzV4pD

next.title: Why do we fight, and how do we stop? Answer by @lukeburgis, Author of Wanting. https://t.co/zAMDip1ZpS https://t.co/UjRGAy5Ukz

localize.full_text: なぜ人は戦うのか、どうすればやめられるのか？Answer by @lukeburgis, Author of Wanting. https://t.co/zAMDip1ZpS https://t.co/UjRGAy5Ukz
我们为什么要打架，我们如何停止？回答者：@lukeburgis，《想》作者。https://t.co/zAMDip1ZpS https://t.co/UjRGAy5Ukz
我們爲什麼要打架，我們如何停止？回答者：@lukeburgis，《想》作者。https://t.co/zAMDip1ZpS https://t.co/UjRGAy5Ukz
